node.title: "Green Gaiter Bandit" sought for 14 bank robberies or attempts
node.description: The string of robberies or attempts he is suspected in date back to mid-October in Southern California.
node.content: ["An unidentified suspect the FBI is calling the \"Green Gaiter Bandit\" is wanted in connection with over a dozen bank robberies or attempts in Southern California.", "Authorities have asked for public help identifying the suspect, who was given his nickname based on a green face and neck covering he is seen wearing in some surveillance images.\u00a0", "He is believed to be a white male with grey hair who is about six feet tall and between 50 and 60 years old. He has been seen wearing a tan jacket as well as gaiters in colors other than green, and \"a variation of workwear-style clothing,\" authorities said Wednesday.\u00a0", "An unidentified white male suspect known as the \u201cGreen Gaiter\u201d Bandit is believed to have robbed or attempted to rob at least 14 banks in #Orange County & #SouthBayLosAngeles County cities wearing various gaiters since October 2021. Please call 3104776565 w/tips. #WantedWednesday pic.twitter.com/gPwML5yTxf", "The string of robberies or attempts he is suspected in \u2014 at least 14 in total \u2014 date back to October, with the latest taking place last Friday. The targeted banks have included Chase and Wells Fargo   branches.", "During robberies, he normally approaches a teller, and demands money verbally or with a note, or both, authorities said.\u00a0", "The FBI as well as the Huntington Beach Police Department, the Costa Mesa Police Department, the Orange County Sheriff's Department, the Gardena Police Department, the Placentia Police Department and the Torrance Police Department are conducting the investigation.", "For Breaking News & Analysis Download the Free CBS News app"]
